cookingTips: Cook quinces with water until completely soft and falling apart, about 40-50 minutes
Push cooked quinces through a food mill for smooth paste consistency
Simmer paste mixture slowly to prevent scorching, stirring frequently during cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Quince paste (dulce de membrillo) is a traditional Spanish preserve. Are you making this for serving with cheese or for using in other recipes like empanadas?
